title: Kristian Thalaite u
lyrics:
Kristian thalaite u lungrual takin,
Lalpa tana thawk fo turin;
Hmatiam hlen tumin kan ke pen rualin,
Lalram i din thar zel ang u.

Thiltha ti atan a siam a awmin,
Ama kutchhuak kan ni si a;
Chu thil tha tih chu kan awmna turin,
Lalpa'n a buatsaih lawk a ni,

Kan vanglaini te hi a rei lovang,
He khawvel a kan kan cham chhung hian;
Chuvangin vanglai hunte hmang thain,
Lalpa tan i thawk zel ang u.

Kan vanglaini te hi hlobet par angin,
A parmawina a la chuai ang;
Nakinah Lalpan min hruai hun chuan,
A lo la par vul leh ngei ang.
